name: Olivia Parr-Rud
what_you_do: Olivia Parr-Rud helps individuals share their wisdom through writing, speaking, teaching, and coaching, particularly in times of change and rebirth.
who_you_serve: She serves wisdom-bearers who are looking to make a positive difference in the world and share their experiences and insights.
signature_programs: Rock Your Wisdom Mastermind, LOVE@WORK, THE LOVE@WORK METHOD
current_projects: Relaunching the Amazing Aging Show in February 2024 and starting the Rock Your Wisdom Mastermind in March 2024.
bio: Author of several books including LOVE@WORK and THE LOVE@WORK METHOD, with a focus on helping others share their wisdom.
business_focus: Olivia Parr-Rud helps individuals share their wisdom through writing, speaking, teaching, and coaching, particularly in times of change and rebirth. (wisdom sharing)
